alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stark County through 245 PM EDT... At 202 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Massillon, or 9 miles southwest of Canton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canton, Massillon, Green, Alliance, North Canton, Louisville, Minerva, Brewster, Navarre, Canal Fulton, East Canton, Meyers Lake, Hills And Dales, Robertsville, Maximo, Perry Heights, North Lawrence and Greentown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
